GREETING.greet: Hello this is the change, nine one one, what is your emergency?

NOT_FULL_SENTENCE.reply: I'm sorry, I didn't get that. if you have emergency, Could you please tell me what the incident was again?

FIRST_ENTER_ERROR.reply: this is 911 call, if you have emergency,please tell me what is the incident, such as i see an accident,or i see an accident plus location
